rules._comment: Split into absolute (always apply) vs mode-dependent (context matters). Extended from create-skill SKILL.md
absolute: Never create project/skill folders directly → use create-* skills
Never auto-load learning skills → suggest, user decides
Never create README.md, CHANGELOG.md, INSTALLATION_GUIDE.md in skills
Never add auxiliary documentation not needed for AI execution
Never duplicate information (SKILL.md OR references, not both)
plan_mode: DO read project files to understand scope
DO question assumptions and validate approach
DO offer mental models for complex decisions
execute_mode: Read _resume.md for context on current step
Complete steps in order, mark done before next
DON'T read project files directly - use execute-project
